message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would really benefit you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.  What do you think?

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13,000?
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $13,000 is cutting it a bit close for me.  How about we settle at $13,500? That's a fair compromise.

I understand that you're trying to make a profit, Alice, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $13,000. I'm willing to go up to $13,250, but no more than that. Can we meet at $13,250?
